law.catch_line: Administrative regulations regarding supervisors of record.

text.section: The board shall promulgate administrative regulations in accordance with KRS Chapter 13A to define the process to register with the board as a supervisor of record, including required supervisory training.

A registered alcohol and drug peer support specialist shall only practice as an employee of a licensed facility or under the board-approved supervision of a certified alcohol and drug counselor or licensed clinical alcohol and drug counselor.

law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 9, effective June 24, 2015.
